availableItems.name: Blonde
availableItems.description: The most notorious of Cahaba’s brews, this drinkable beer has an IBU of just 23. Our Blonde Ale is brewed with an unmistakable blend of European malts and hops, resulting in a clean finish. Blonde is light-bodied with just enough malt and hop to keep your interest.

availableItems.name: Cinematic Sour
availableItems.description: Our Cinematic Sour is a Berliner Weisse fruited with passion fruit and pink guava giving it a tropical, sweet, and fruity finish.

availableItems.name: DD's Cherry Hibiscus Sour
availableItems.description: Without being too sour, DD’s Cherry Hibiscus Sour has a nice sweetness from the cherry and hibiscus. Extremely light and effervescent, enjoy this beer on draft while you can!

availableItems.name: Lager
availableItems.description: Proudly introducing your new favorite beer: CAHABA LAGER This lager is medium bodied yet not too heavy with simple ingredients yet brewed complexity. Saaz hops, pilsner malt, and flaked maize give this beer a sweet taste that finishes dry. Find balance in your life with Cahaba Lager!

availableItems.name: Oka Uba IPA
availableItems.description: An American IPA in the truest sense. The straightforward Oka Uba is loaded up with classic hops at the end of the boil and then dry hopped for an earthy and slightly citrusy flavor and aroma. This gorgeous IPA illuminates an orange and red hue in the light. It is a staple of both our community and our Taproom. The name is derived from the indigenous word for the Cahaba river and can be translated to “the Water Above”.

availableItems.name: Pale Ale
availableItems.description: Don’t let the low gravity fool you! Our American Pale Ale is as surprisingly full-bodied and flavorful as a “small” beer can be. With plenty of malt character and a great mouth feel, don’t be surprised at the good head retention in your pint glass. A bready finish follows the refreshingly subtle hop character and floral aroma for a perfectly balanced session beer. Drink it down and admire the lacing when it’s done.

availableItems.name: Record Session IPA
availableItems.description: In collaboration with Seasick Records, Cahaba Brewing is proud to present Record Session IPA, a low ABV India Pale Ale with a complex melody of flavors. In harmony with tropical fruit notes, Simcoe, Centennial, Columbus and Idaho 7 hops give a bitter finish.

availableItems.name: Basic Beach
availableItems.description: Crystal clear and refreshing, this sour has a little sourness and a nice saltiness that will transport you to a hot day on the beach.

availableItems.name: Blonde
availableItems.description: The most notorious of Cahaba’s brews, this drinkable beer has an IBU of just 23. Our Blonde Ale is brewed with an unmistakable blend of European malts and hops, resulting in a clean finish. Blonde is light-bodied with just enough malt and hop to keep your interest.

availableItems.name: Cinematic Sour
availableItems.description: Our Cinematic Sour is a Berliner Weisse fruited with passion fruit and pink guava giving it a tropical, sweet, and fruity finish.

availableItems.name: Irish Stout
availableItems.description: This take on a classic dry Irish Stout is available in cans every Winter, but you will find this on draft throughout the year. It is full of the roasted barley, malt character, and smoothness expected from the style, but with a subtle fruitiness reminiscent of the Irish yeast used. This beer pours with a satisfyingly dark color and surprisingly light body. The Irish Stout is roasty on the front with a chocolatey finish.

availableItems.name: Lager
availableItems.description: Proudly introducing your new favorite beer: CAHABA LAGER This lager is medium bodied yet not too heavy with simple ingredients yet brewed complexity. Saaz hops, pilsner malt, and flaked maize give this beer a sweet taste that finishes dry. Find balance in your life with Cahaba Lager!

availableItems.description: An American IPA in the truest sense. A bready finish follows the refreshingly subtle hop character and floral aroma for a perfectly balanced session beer. Drink it down and admire the lacing when it’s done.

availableItems.name: Steel Cut City Oatmeal Stout
availableItems.description: Close your eyes on the first sip of this stout and you'll swear you're biting into a chocolate-covered espresso bean. Steel Cut City is slightly bitter, crisp, and refreshing with a semi-sweet finish. Enjoy a pint on its own or with your favorite dessert.

availableItems.name: Foamy Naomi
availableItems.description: Straight up IPA. Crisp, hoppy, bitter, and dry. Everything you're looking for in an IPA. Big aroma with a matching palette to go with it.

availableItems.name: Amarillo IPA
availableItems.description: The Single Hop Amarillo IPA is crafted with Amarillo hops, giving it a sweet and slightly floral taste with a hint of citrus bitterness. It's balanced by Wheat, Vienna, and 2 Row malt and is soft on the palate.

availableItems.name: Queen of Hops
availableItems.description: Hoppy Lager

availableItems.name: Rum 750mL Bottle (R)
availableItems.description: Distilled from molasses and pure cain sugar.  It's aged for 12 moths in Cahaba Bourbon barrels.   It has notes of caramel apple, butterscotch, and vanilla bean with the aroma of cinnamon sugar, oak, and toffee.

availableItems.name: Dry Bag - Orange
availableItems.description: This Heathered Waterproof Dry Bag is perfect for lake days, poolside lounging, or beachcombing. Made of durable polyester, this 5 liter bag floats if dropped in water, keeping its contents safe and dry. Featuring a roll top closure with a clip for easy carrying
